content:
I am trying to run this tutorial.
https://github.com/cmu-l3/ntptutorial-II

I didn't change anything. However, I am getting the error below.
image.png

Full notebook is here:
https://github.com/cmu-l3/ntptutorial-II/blob/main/partI_nextstep/notebooks/I_nextstep_lean__part1_data.ipynb

Adding that file to vscode as a workspace doesn't change anything.

Can't figure out if this is a VS code issue or an issue with my system

Was able to replicate on another machine, most likely not an editor bug. Running
lake clean && lake update && lake build

changes the error. Now, I get the error below for the code snippet above. Could it be caused because lakefile.lean does not specify where Examples directory is? I simply says.

lean_lib Examples where

The error I get after rebuilding lake.

PANIC at Lean.PersistentHashMap.find! Lean.Data.PersistentHashMap:160:14: key is not in the map backtrace: [./.lake/build/bin/training_data](https://file+.vscode-resource.vscode-cdn.net/home/baran/Desktop/welleck/ntptutorial-II-main/partI_nextstep/notebooks/.lake/build/bin/training_data)(+0x375c10e)[0x6065a940510e] [./.lake/build/bin/training_data](https://file+.vscode-resource.vscode-cdn.net/home/baran/Desktop/welleck/ntptutorial-II-main/partI_nextstep/notebooks/.lake/build/bin/training_data)(+0x6315dc)[0x6065a62da5dc] [./.lake/build/bin/training_data](https://file+.vscode-resource.vscode-cdn.net/home/baran/Desktop/welleck/ntptutorial-II-main/partI_nextstep/notebooks/.lake/build/bin/training_data)(+0x6320cc)[0x6065a62db0cc] [./.lake/build/bin/training_data](https://file+.vscode-resource.vscode-cdn.net/home/baran/Desktop/welleck/ntptutorial-II-main/partI_nextstep/notebooks/.lake/build/bin/training_data)(+0x3768c01)[0x6065a9411c01] [./.lake/build/bin/training_data](https://file+.vscode-resource.vscode-cdn.net/home/baran/Desktop/welleck/ntptutorial-II-main/partI_nextstep/notebooks/.lake/build/bin/training_data)(+0x3768c01)[0x6065a9411c01] [./.lake/build/bin/training_data](https://file+.vscode-resource.vscode-cdn.net/home/baran/Desktop/welleck/ntptutorial-II-main/partI_nextstep/notebooks/.lake/build/bin/training_data)(+0x1bdf10c)[0x6065a788810c] [./.lake/build/bin/training_data](https://file+.vscode-resource.vscode-cdn.net/home/baran/Desktop/welleck/ntptutorial-II-main/partI_nextstep/notebooks/.lake/build/bin/training_data)(+0x37680e5)[0x6065a94110e5] .... Truncated
I think you should be asking these questions to the authors of the repo or in the machine learning channel, perhaps nobody who knows the answer is reading #new members
This is a technical question about the specific use of someone else's code, not a beginner question about general lean or mathlib use

Thanks. I wasn't sure if it was a generic lean problem or code specific. Especially the first itteration of the bug seem to not be able to find a folder that is obviously there. I will mark it solved.
Baran Zadeoglu has marked this topic as resolved.
yeah it's a perfectly valid question but I don't think this is the right channel for it. There is #Machine Learning for Theorem Proving where people who use those tools might hang out?
